product_name: Scarpa Terminator X Telemark Boots - Men's - 2013/2014
long_description: Designed for compatibility with Rottefella NTN Freedom touring bindings and Dynafit-style tech bindings, the Scarpa Terminator X boots have the power to drive modern backcountry skis down steep lines. Dynafit-style tech fittings allow you to ski telemark or randonee with the same pair of boots; be sure to read the owner's manual prior to using the boots with tech bindings. Triple-injection molding offers power for the descent; Pebax(R) plastic performs well across a wide range of temperatures, ensuring consistent flex, strength and stability. Scarpa Intuition(R) Performance Tour liners offer warmth, comfort and resistance to packing out, and can be remolded many times. Dual-injection edge guards protect the bellows from sharp ski edges. Pivoting tongues make getting in and out of the Scarpa Terminator X boots easier. Buckles are lightweight and easy to use; power straps snug the boots around your calves.
short_description: Designed for compatibility with Rottefella NTN Freedom touring bindings and Dynafit-style tech bindings, the Scarpa Terminator X boots have the power to drive modern backcountry skis down steep lines.
